p: As a result, nowadays, the research of natural antioxidants, for improving oil oxidative stability and for replacing synthetic antioxidants, has attracted more and more attention from researchers [ 1, 8]. When compared to synthetic antioxidants, natural antioxidants have many advantages [ 9]. They are considered to be safe and readily acceptable by consumers. In addition, these antioxidants not only stabilize edible oils, but also improve the nutraceutical value in order to obtain a value-added product [ 10].
